item.title: Clear Form in Redux when Navigating with React-Router
item.description: Hi there! I have worked on my project using a React-Redux architecture with React-Router for navigation. I have implemented forms for adding and editing resources. I have observed weird behavior: Add new resource with a description: “Hello World!” Start editing another resource with a description: “My new comment…” Input for description contains a previous value: “Hello World!” I was expecting to see the current description of the resource: “My new comment…”, not the value from the previous form.
